fr.cs.simergy.humanresources

Class Patient

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cs.simergy.simulation.Linkage
      • fr.cs.simergy.simulation.Link
        • fr.cs.simergy.humanresources.Patient

  • public class Patient
extends Link
    A Patient is the ED's client. This class contains patient's identity information and methods about his evolution through the ED workflow.
